name: Hotel Shree Murli
description: Hotel Shree Murli Shegaon is a charming retreat nestled in the heart of Shegaon, offering comfortable accommodations and warm hospitality. The hotel's well-appointed rooms provide a cozy ambiance for guests to relax and unwind. Indulge in delicious cuisine served at the on-site restaurant, showcasing a variety of local and international flavors. With attentive service and modern amenities, including a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi, Hotel Shree Murli ensures a convenient and enjoyable stay for both leisure and business travelers. Its prime location near popular attractions such as the Anand Sagar and Gajanan Maharaj Temple adds to the allure of this welcoming establishment.

name: Hotel Premdeep
description:
Premdeep Hotel aims to make your visit as relaxing and enjoyable as possible, which is why so many guests continue to come back year after year.

While staying at Premdeep Hotel, visitors can check out Hart Point (1.5 mi) and One Tree Hill Point (1.6 mi), some of Matheran's top attractions.

You’ll enjoy relaxing rooms that offer a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a desk, bringing comfort and convenience to your visit.

The small hotel features room service. Plus, Premdeep Hotel offers an on-site restaurant, providing a pleasant respite from your busy day.

If you are looking for a nearby place to eat, Premdeep Hotel is within walking distance of Hotel Panorama Restaurant (0.3 mi), a popular restaurant in the area.

Should time allow, Louisa Point, Porcupine Point (Sunset Point), and Alexander Point are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.

Premdeep Hotel puts the best of Matheran at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable

area: Acharya Atre Road Next To Police Station
description:
Westend Hotel is located in Matheran. With an outdoor swimming pool, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property has a garden, as well as a restaurant that serves Chinese and Indian cuisine.

All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also offer pool views. At Westend Hotel each room includes bed linen and towels.

name: Mizzle Exotica Lonavala
description:
Situated in Lonavala and only 13 km from Lonavala Railway Station, Mizzle Exotica Lonavala offers accommodation with mountain views, free WiFi and free private parking. There is a private entrance at the apartment for the convenience of those who stay. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a children's playground.

Featuring a balcony, each unit is air conditioned and features a dining area and a seating area with a cable flat-screen TV. The apartment complex provides some units that have a terrace and pool view, and each unit has a private bathroom and a desk. At the apartment complex, the units are fitted with bed linen and towels.

À la carte and Asian breakfast options with local specialities and cheese are available each morning at the apartment. At Mizzle Exotica Lonavala, the family-friendly restaurant is open for dinner, lunch and high tea and specialises in Indian cuisine.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Mahabaleshwar
description:
Set in Mahabaleshwar, 70 metres from Lingmala Falls, Courtyard by Marriott Mahabaleshwar offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. This 5-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. There is a hot tub, evening entertainment and room service.

At the hotel, all rooms include a desk. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms feature bed linen.

Guests at Courtyard by Marriott Mahabaleshwar can enjoy a buffet breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Chinese, Indian and Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested.

You can play table tennis at Courtyard by Marriott Mahabaleshwar, and car hire is available.

Mahabaleshwar Temple is 7.2 km from the hotel, while Venna Lake is 7.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Pune International, 119 km from Courtyard by Marriott Mahabaleshwar, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
